data.title: Remembering the Lesser Known (actors, comedians, etc.)... (vinyl, blues, classic)
data.meta_description: Ann Sheridan - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
data.text:
Quote:

Originally Posted by soupson1

Amazing! I was coming back to post~yes~more redheads, including Ann Sheridan! Now, we'll see if I can recall the others I thought of.

Pat Crowley - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Julie Harris - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

She was a phenomenal actress. It's unfortunate that she didn't do more films.

Alice Krige - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Piper Laurie ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piper_Laurie

It's sad that most people think of her only as "Carrie's mother".

Anita Morris - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Poor Anita was too sexy for TV! The Rolling Stones' video "She Was Hot" was banned from MTV~hard to believe considering what they showed later. From Wikipedia: Her signature number in "Nine" was "A Call from the Vatican" ... She was scheduled to perform the (song) at the Tony Awards in 1982, but the television censors found her outfit too revealing.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FiFnfSTmd_w

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-GMMeOcSRg

Patricia Pearcy - IMDb

Pippa Scott ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pippa_Scott

I'm watching her right now on the "Parasite Mansion" episode of "Boris Karloff's Thriller". Scene-stealer Jeanette Nolan gives another of her wonderful old-woman roles, something she excelled in. I need to post her and her actor husband yet; I don't think they've been mentioned.

I know that I am forgetting others, but perhaps they'll come to mind later.

GENERATIONS 1:

Hume Cronyn ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hume_Cronyn ~ father of Tandy Cronyn, his daughter with the lovely Jessica Tandy

Jessica Tandy ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jessica_Tandy

Tandy Cronyn - IMDb

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qRLa-_4LOVs

Alan Hale, Sr. ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Hale,_Sr. ~ father of Alan Hale (Jr.) aka Skipper of "Gilligan's Island" // His wife was Silent film actress Gretchen Hartman.

Alan Hale, Jr. ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Hale,_Jr.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tqP3BMEI3GM

Walter Huston ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Huston ~ father of John Huston and grandfather of Angelica Huston. (I don't think they need links, do they? Some might not be aware that John Huston acted, as well as directed.)

I posted this song on another forum and thought it was perfect for this thread.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3mAT-4FdP4

Last edited by MystMoonstruck; 03-11-2014 at 04:20 PM..
